topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Yarra Trams: Always on Time (Except During Cricket)
ideas.premise: A Yarra tram packed with cricket fans is stuck because a six landed on the overhead power lines.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable Melbourne experience combined with cricket chaos - trams always delayed.

ideas.title: Shane Warne's Ghostly Commentary
ideas.premise: Shane Warne's ghost, wearing cricket whites and holding a VB, offers controversial commentary from the stands.
ideas.why_funny: Warnieâ€™s a legend, and controversial commentary is his thing. VB is peak Aussie.

ideas.title: Flinders Street Clock: Stuck on 'Six'
ideas.premise: The Flinders Street Station clocks are stuck, displaying 'Six' repeatedly, frustrating commuters.
ideas.why_funny: Iconic Melbourne landmark malfunctioning because of a cricket score is absurd.

ideas.title: The MCG: Seagulls vs Boundary Riders
ideas.premise: A flock of aggressive Melbourne seagulls actively interfere with boundary fielders trying to catch a ball.
ideas.why_funny: Seagulls are a constant MCG presence. The battle for the ball is funny.

ideas.title: Coffee Run Umpire
ideas.premise: The umpire signals for a 'wide' while secretly gesturing to the team bench for a flat white coffee.
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne loves coffee. An umpire prioritizing it mid-match is unexpected.

ranking: Yarra Trams: Always on Time (Except During Cricket)
The MCG: Seagulls vs Boundary Riders
winner: Yarra Trams: Always on Time (Except During Cricket)

headlines.title: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary
headlines.summary: Following a dominant win in Melbourne, Australia can take a massive step towards winning the T20 series against India with a victory in Hobart. Check
